title: 8-bit Shift Register Function Block
description:
CIRCLE_C calculates the arc length of an arc with the angle AX and radius
RX. If the angle is set AX = 360 so the circumference is calculated.
name: SHR_8PLE

input.name: Din
input.description: Input data bit to be shifted into the register.

input.name: Dload
input.description: Byte value to load into the register when load signal is active.

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock signal which triggers the shifting operation.

input.name: UP
input.description: Direction of shift; TRUE for shift up, FALSE for shift down.

input.name: load
input.description: Signal to load Dload value into the register.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal to clear the register.

output.name: DOut
output.description: Output data bit, represents the bit shifted out of the register.
